clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of LL-37 Cream on Bacteria Colonization, Inflammation Response and Healing Rate of Diabetic Foot Ulcers
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy of LL-37 Cream on Aerobic Bacteria Colonization Pattern, Inflammation Response: Interleukin 1α (IL-1α) and Tumor Necrosis Factor α (TNF-α), and Healing Rate of Diabetic Foot Ulcers

brief_summary.textblock:
Diabetic foot ulcer (DFU) is a common complication of diabetes with global prevalence of 6.3%. Treatment of diabetic foot ulcer (DFU) is challenging with disappointing outcome. Wound debridement, infection control, pressure relief and revascularization are main pillars of DFU management. Various substances and modalities are being investigated for their potential effects in treating DFU, one of which is LL-37.
In this randomized, controlled trial, 40 patients with uncomplicated DFU will be enrolled. Patients are randomly assigned to undergo twice a week treatment with 0.5 mg/mL LL-37 cream (treatment group) or placebo cream (control group) for 4 weeks in addition to standard wound care. The primary outcomes are the healing rate measured by wound area and granulation index and changes in patterns of aerobic bacteria colonization during the 4-week study duration and changes in concentrations of IL-α and TNF-α from fluid collected from DFU on the end of the second and third week of study compared to baseline.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Healing Rate at 1 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of granulation index at 1 week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by difference of granulation index by ImageJ

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Healing Rate at 2 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of granulation index at 2 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Measured by difference of granulation index by ImageJ

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Healing Rate at 3 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of granulation index at 3 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Measured by difference of granulation index by ImageJ

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Healing Rate at 4 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of granulation index at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Measured by difference of granulation index by ImageJ

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Aerobic Bacteria Count and Type of Bacteria Species at 1 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab at 1 week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Aerobic Bacteria Count and Type of Bacteria Species at 2 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab at 2 week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Aerobic Bacteria Count and Type of Bacteria Species at 3 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab at 3 week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Aerobic Bacteria Count and Type of Bacteria Species at 4 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline of the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab at 4 week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the species of bacteria grown on culture and the quantities of their colonies in CFU/swab

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Inflammation Marker at 2 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline at the end of second week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the concentrations of IL-α and TNF-α by ELISA

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of Inflammation Marker at 3 Week
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline at the end of third week
primary_outcome.description: Measured by the concentrations of IL-α and TNF-α by ELISA

arm_group.description: 0.5 mg/mL LL-37 cream, administered twice a week for 4 weeks
Placebo cream, administered twice a week for 4 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with DFU
- Ankle brachial index (ABI) 0.9 - 1.3
- Wound area 5 - 20 cm^2
- Wound depth until subcutaneous tissue
- Without systemic infection, osteomyelitis, septic arthritis, or fasciitis
- Subjects are willing to participate by signing consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Gangrene
- On treatment with systemic corticosteroids within 7 days before the start of study
- On treatment with systemic antibiotics within 2 days before the start of study
- Patients with end stage renal disease

facility.name: RS Pusat Angkatan Darat Gatot Soebroto
